text: (Ariyamaiyil tankal mutataikalaip pinparrum) anta nirakarippalarkalin utaranam, (arttattai unaratu) kuccalaiyum ocaiyaiyum mattum ketkakkutiyatin (atavatu kalnataikalin) utaranattai ottirukkiratu. (Melum, avarkal) cevitarkalakavum, umaiyarkalakavum, kurutarkalakavum irukkinranar. Atalal, avarkal (etaiyum) arintu kollave mattarkal
